features: Seventh Generation Free & Clear Dishwasher Detergent Packs have an enzyme-rich formula that cuts through tough grease and food residue to leave dishes sparkling clean
Our powerful dishwasher soap is free of fragrances, dyes, phosphates, and chlorine bleach
Convenient single dose dishwasher packs, just toss right into the dishwasher
This dishwasher soap is a USDA Certified Biobased Product, 79 percent
Dishwasher tabs come in an easy-to-use resealable pouch
Caring today for the next seven generations with Seventh Generation dishwasher detergent pods
body.description: When life is busy, don’t let messes slow you down. Seventh Generation dishwasher packs offer a convenient and powerful clean that blasts through tough residue to leave your dishes streak-free with just one wash, no pre-rinse necessary. Our single dose dishwasher tabs come in a dissolvable PVA film that can be tossed right into the dishwasher for a hassle-free alternative to traditional powders and gels – no need to unwrap or measure. Seventh Generation Free & Clear Dishwasher Detergent Packs are made with plant-based ingredients free of fragrances, dyes, phosphates, and chlorine bleach. Because trust us, we can handle the job without them. For more than 25 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating safe and effective plant-based products that work. Really well. Our dish detergent uses powerful plant-based ingredients like surfactants and enzymes to break down tough residue and lift away food, leaving your dishes sparkling clean. So, how does it all work? The enzymes cut through grease and food by breaking down starch and protein-based residue while the surfactants remove dirt and grease by holding the molecules in suspension, so they can wash away. Yes, even those fussy egg stains. Based in Vermont, Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation dishwasher soap products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

Seventh Generation dish detergent packs offer a convenient and powerful clean that blasts through tough residue to leave your dishes streak-free with just one wash, no pre-rinse necessary. Our single dose dishwasher tabs come in a dissolvable PVA film that can be tossed right into the dishwasher for a hassle-free alternative to traditional powders and gels – no need to unwrap or measure. 90% Plastic-Free Packaging! The Right Amount Every Time A convenient single dose dishwasher pack, ready to toss right into the dishwasher and available in an easy to use resealable pouch or tub! NEW 90% Plastic Free Packaging NEW, our Dishwasher Detergent Packs now have 90% Plastic Free Packaging, helping our mission to transform the world into a healthy, sustainable, and equitable place for the next seven generations. Powerful Clean Enzyme rich formula cuts through tough grease and food residue to leave dishes sparkling clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans my dishes, no horrible chemical smells or scent, no apparent residue, works great with my water. Doesn't contain any synthetic rinse aids that can negatively impact my digestion.I prefer when they sell it in cardboard packaging as it is easily recycled or composted. I dislike when the pods come in a plastic bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good solid clean - no after smell!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the ability of these tiny little pods to do so much cleaning on my dishes! Did the job perfectly - no complaints. Not much fragrance, just cleans solidly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love with absolute best dishwasher detergent I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I used to think I had a really bad dishwasher, even though it is only about five years old. I hated the job it did so much that I stopped using it for two years and did all my dishes by hand. I recently decided to give it another try and found I still was dissatisfied. My dishes seemed never to come out really clean -- which was particularly evident on the silverware -- and the whole unit smelled bad. Then one day I received a sample of Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent. I tried it and I FELL IN LOVE! My dishes came out squeaky-clean and sparkling -- silverware, glasses, everything. I do still rinse, etc., as one should, before loading, but I've always done that, and I still have never gotten this kind of results! The sample included two pods, but I didn't even wait to use the second one. I immediately ordered a bagful, and I have not been sorry. I don't even need a rinse agent when I use these pods. It is now a pleasure to use my dishwasher. I am thrilled to have found this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No residue. This stuff works!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for months and it is my go to. Clean ingredients, cleans my dishes well, and I don’t have white residue left on any of the items after washing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great detergent - Does not come in plastic container shown
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to save the planet and buy a recyclable container instead of a cardboard box with plastic bags inside but that is what I received. From my local discount store and natural foods store I've bought the smaller quantity boxes that come with non-recyclable plastic bags inside. I was excited to see this plastic container on Amazon. What I received was a big cardboard box (recyclable) but with two bags of pods inside. I tried and failed. Sad.I do love the detergent -which is why it has 4 stars. (5 if I had received what I expected.) I turned to this natural brand after another one etched some glasses.I also wish 7th Generation still made this in the boxes of loose detergent where I could pour it into the little dispensers myself. Old school but nothing wrong with that, it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for my dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: Used Cascade for years, but it leaves a chemical smell even after rinse/dry cycle. When my steel coffee tumblers started tasting like the smell, I decided to try something else. We've used 7th Generation liquid laundry product for many years, so I ordered some dishwasher pods. I truly believe it cleans better than Cascade and does not smell. The pods never get hard from storing under the sink (like the Cascade pods) and it is easily shaped to fit the dispenser. Not going back! Love 7th Generation products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No chemical smell, no mess, the dishes are crystal clear after using. Recommend 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fresh and Effective Choice!
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent Packs, and I'm genuinely impressed. The lemon scent adds a delightful touch, making every wash cycle a refreshing experience. What sets these packs apart is their apparent commitment to fewer chemicals compared to another well-known brand. My dishes come out clean, and I appreciate the eco-friendly approach. These detergent packs provide a powerful clean without compromising on freshness or environmental impact. A great choice for those who prioritize effectiveness and fewer chemicals in their dishwasher detergent!
Great product, very clean and scent free dishes!

We've had difficulty finding a brand that didn't have a strong scent, and more importantly, that didn't leave a soap residue coating. Even using a rinse aid didn't seem to help (our dishwasher is brand new). Fill a glass with water and we had soap bubbles at the top. Then we tried Seventh Generation dishwasher packs and now we have sparkling clean dishes every time, with no strong scent, no residue and no soap bubbles. Awesome!
Limpia muy bien, me encanta, y sin fragancia es lo mejor.

Sometimes the pack won't dissolve during the wash cycle if it falls to the bottom of the dishwasher. So I usually just set the pack on top of a plate before closing the door and then it dissolves and cleans well

This is the only dish detergent I will use. It doesn’t leave any sort of film or chemical smell on your dishes. I found with the other name brands you would say pour a glass of water and actually taste the chemicals and smell in the glass. This is well worth the little bit extra you pay.
